dkeep.logic

Class Ogre

  • java.lang.Object
    • dkeep.logic.Ogre

  • public class Ogre
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that keeps the information of an ogre, its bat and the ogre's stunned status
    Author:
    Leonardo Capozzi, Ricardo Carvalho

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Ogre(int[] ogrepos, int[] batpos)
      Creates an ogre object given its starting position and the bat's position

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int[] getBat()
      Gets the ogre's bat position
      int[] getOgre()
      Gets the ogre's position
      int getStunned()
      Gets the stunned status of the ogre
      void OgreErase(Map m)
      Clears the ogre's and its bat's cells in the map
      void OgreMove(Map m)
      Sets in motion the ogre and its bat's movement, randomly selecting a direction until it is valid
      void setStunned()
      Sets the ogre as stunned for 2 turns

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Ogre

        public Ogre(int[] ogrepos,
            int[] batpos)
        Creates an ogre object given its starting position and the bat's position
        Parameters:
        ogrepos - array containing the ogre's coordinates
        batpos - array containing the ogre's bat coordinates

    • Method Detail

      • getOgre

        public int[] getOgre()
        Gets the ogre's position
        Returns:
        array with ogre's coordinates

      • getBat

        public int[] getBat()
        Gets the ogre's bat position
        Returns:
        array with ogre's bat coordinates

      • getStunned

        public int getStunned()
        Gets the stunned status of the ogre
        Returns:
        int with the stunned status (0 if not stunned, different otherwise)

      • setStunned

        public void setStunned()
        Sets the ogre as stunned for 2 turns

      • OgreErase

        public void OgreErase(Map m)
        Clears the ogre's and its bat's cells in the map
        Parameters:
        m - level's map containing the ogre

      • OgreMove

        public void OgreMove(Map m)
        Sets in motion the ogre and its bat's movement, randomly selecting a direction until it is valid
        Parameters:
        m - level's map containing the ogre
